entry.title: Trump Could Announce Bitcoin As US Strategic Reserve Asset In Nashville July 27
entry.summary:
Former US President Donald Trump is set to make a highly anticipated appearance as a keynote speaker at the upcoming Bitcoin 2024 Conference in Nashville, scheduled from July 25-27. This has created a buzz of excitement among crypto investors as rumors suggest that Trump may deliver a significant announcement during his speech.
Bitcoin To Become Strategic Reserve Asset For The US?
According to Dennis Porter, co-founder of the non-profit organization Satoshi Act, Donald Trump intends to unveil BTC as a strategic reserve asset for the United States.¬†
Convinced of this fact, Porter claimed, ‚ÄúThis is no joke. My sources are credible.‚Äù Porter added that Bitcoin as a strategic reserve asset for the US Treasury is a ‚Äúno brainer.‚Äù
‚Ä¶The paradigm will shift and the world will understand‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bitcoin Adversary Senator Bob Menendez Found Guilty In Federal Bribery Case
entry.summary:
In a shocking turn of events, United States Senator Bob Menendez, a Democrat from New Jersey and a known critic of Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies, has been convicted in a major bribery scandal. Menendez is accused of collecting payments in return for using his influence to support the interests of foreign countries, which has raised crucial worries about high-level governmental corruption.
Bitcoin Critic Faces Potential Jail Term For Bribery Crimes
Specifically, Bob Menendez, the popular US Senator, was found guilty on 16 counts related to a scheme in which he took bribes for aiding foreign governments, including fiat currencies, gold bars, and a luxury car. With his conviction, Menendez‚Äôs political career took a sharp turn, given his negative stand against Bitcoin and other digital curr‚Ä¶

entry.title: Kraken Extends Custody Services to Institutional Clients in UK, Australia
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency exchange Kraken has expanded its custody services to institutional clients in the UK and Australia. This step reportedly marks the first international expansion of the service following its launch in the US as a solution for digital asset management. Kraken Custody Expands Globally Initially launched in March, Kraken Custody targets institutional clients with a platform for managing digital assets. Among its features are security protocols and access controls. These features are integrated into the broader Kraken product suite, offering institutions solutions for their crypto investment strategies. Additionally, Kraken Custody enables institutions to manage and scale their strategies effectively. It offers its services through Kraken Financial, a US-based state-ch‚Ä¶

entry.title: Crypto And Politics: Ethereum Founder Shares Thoughts On What‚Äôs Really Going On
entry.summary:
Crypto and politics have begun to go hand in hand as the crypto community rallies behind pro-crypto politicians. Ethereum‚Äôs co-founder Vitalik Buterin recently had something to say about this growing trend and why it is against the values of the crypto industry.¬†
Crypto Is More Than Just Money
In his article arguing against the support for ‚Äòpro-crypto‚Äô politicians, Vitalik noted that crypto is more than just money and that the crypto community shouldn‚Äôt be rallying behind a politician because they support people‚Äôs rights to hold and spend these tokens. He gave a rundown of why crypto was created in the first place to show that these politicians may not necessarily be in support of the main ideologies behind the crypto industry.¬†
Vitalik explained that the cypherpunk movement was wh‚Ä¶

entry.title: Crypto Mining In Russia: Putin Warns Of Potential Energy Catastrophe
entry.summary:
Russian President Vladimir Putin has cautioned of an impending energy problem brought about by the unbridled growth of bitcoin mining in his nation.
Emphasizing the enormous power consumption of mining activities, Putin said that these operations account for about 1.5% of Russia‚Äôs overall electricity consumption. This translates to a whopping 16 billion kilowatt-hours yearly.
The president‚Äôs worries center especially on areas like Irkutsk, Buryatia, and Zabaikalsky Krai where power shortages have recently become consistent.
While not conventional money, cryptocurrencies are being utilized more and more for international settlements, Putin said, underlining the significant energy consumption involved in digital coin mining.
Russia has become a hub for these operations because of ‚Ä¶

entry.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token
entry.summary:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.
In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he‚Äôs still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn‚Äôt done with the project. Instead, he‚Äôs planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.

USDC protects the dollar: Circle ad. Robinhood considers crypto futures in US & EU. Another BTC miner looks to IPO in US. Vitalik bullish on prediction markets. Sentient Labs raises $85m for AI on SOL. Mantra to tokenise $500m of real estate. TAO falls 15% after security breach. Crypto scams & hacks hit $572m in Q2.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 150 - BILLY TO A BILLY?
entry.summary: BTC ETF inflows hit highest in a month. ETH ETF inflows to hit $5bn in 6 months: Gemini. ETH public funds see largest outflow since 2022. SOL hits new ATH for monthly economic value. Sellers starting to look exhausted: Crypto Quant. Silvergate sued by SEC, settles for $63m. Circle gets stablecoin license for USDC in EU. US DoJ ironically chooses Coinbase for custody. Bitcoin miner aims for $16bn IPO. Bitfarms increases BTC mining amid takeover attempt. DOT has 2 year runway amid large burn. DOT ecosystem builders turn against team. PENDLE TVL falls $3bn as restaking rewards end. PayPal stablecoin goes live on Jupiter. At least $600m altcoin unlocks this month.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 149 - LUCA NETZ LIVE!
entry.summary: BTC bounces back above $61k after nosedive. SOL leads majors, BTC dominance falls. BTC RSI hit 18, largest net selling day in over a year. $174m ETF outflow led by GBTC. German government sells $24m more more BTC. Mt Gox info probably ‚Äòleaked to insiders‚Äô. Mr 100 buys dip for first time in 34 days. SOL leads Moonpay transactions for 5th week. Trump may speak at Bitcoin Nashville. Biden rehires crypto advisor. Crypto & AI complement each other: Balaji. Bitcoin will protect AI‚Äôs wealth: Pomp. Tether stops minting on Algorand & EOS. Jupiter launches v3 swaps. ETH Foundation mailing list gets leaked. Jump CEO resigns after CFTC investigation. 54% of Japanese institutional investors want BTC. Strike launches in UK. MiCA approved EUR stablecoins coming in 6 days.

entry.title: Transhumanism and the Quest for Immortality with SingularityNET CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel
entry.summary: Transhumanism is a philosophical and intellectual movement that advocates the enhancement of the human condition using technologies that can increase longevity, cognition, and well-being. In this interview, SingularityNET founder and CEO Dr. Ben Goertzel discusses his background in the transhumanist movement and how AI, and AGI will play a part.

entry.title: Vivendi Web3 Lead: 'There's No Ethical GenAI if You Don't Protect Content'
entry.summary: Fabien Aufrechter, VP of Web 3.0 at Vivendi, joined Rug Radio's Farokh aboard the Joker Odyssey at Cannes Lions to discuss the media group's plans for a global digital copyright, and how token-gated media will lead to the end of third-party cookies.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 148 - SOL ETF NARRATIVE DOMINATES
entry.summary: SOL leads majors as Van Eck files for ETF. Bitwise hints at SOL ETF filing. SOL will get ETF, ADA & XRP won‚Äôt: GSR. SOL price may rise 8.9x with ETF: GSR. Coinbase & Stripe team up for onboarding. BTC miner sell pressure weakens. BTC activity drops to lowest level in 10 years. Steve Cohen shuts down crypto arm of hedge fund. Crypto unmentioned in Presidential debate. Kraken co-founder donates $1m to Trump. Bolivia lifts BTC ban. MegaLabs raises $20m, aims for 100k TPS.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 147 - THE BLAST FALLOUT
entry.summary: Crypto bounces, ETFs see another small net inflow. The US government sends 3940 BTC to exchanges. Spot ETH ETFs may be coming July 4th. Coinbase sues SEC over FOIA inquiries. Most ‚Äòobvious & attractive‚Äô buying opp possible. US man convicted of home invasions to steal BTC. Blast launches at $2.5bn FDV, disappoints many. ADA faces DDoS attacks with 200 transactions. Losses from deep fakes could hit $24bn in 2024. Miners face M&A boom on AI retrofitting. Marathon mines $16M KAS. Vitalik introduces ZK voting company Rarimo. Animoca Brands considers public listing.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 146 - IT'S BLAST DAY!
entry.summary: BTC ETFs reverse 7-day outflow. Geverman government to sell $35m more BTC. SOL Blinks allows transactions from any website. Jupiter allows you to swap tokens from X. Helius allows SOL staking from X. Drift allows you to leverage trade from X. ETH supply increases for 73 days straight. ETF review going smoothly: Gensler. Expect $15bn net inflows for ETH ETF: Bitwise. VanEck to waive ETH ETF fee until 2025. UAE new regulations could limit stablecoins. Court convicts two men for crypto ‚Äòsecurities fraud‚Äô. BTC ETFs to be approved by Morgan Stanley. Vanguard CEO calls BTC ‚Äòa stable asset like gold‚Äô. Blast launches today, 16.5% as community airdrop. $2.9bn FDV for Blast on Aevo, others predict higher. Top Blast holders to see vesting over 6 months. Nubank to integrate Bitcoin Lightning Network. FTX creditors to vote on cash or crypto repayment.
